QuestData.Title: Mulverick's Plight
QuestData.Description: You were sent here to free me? It seems that makes us allies.$b$bSlavemaster Turgall within the Soostained Mines will certainly have the key to this cage.$b$bWhile you're in there, do you think you could see which of those spineless taskmasters took my axes?
QuestData.LogDescription: Get the key from Slavemaster Turgall and find Mulverick's Axes.
